item.title: Learning goals
item.description: Week 9 Lab 7, Exercise 1: Run batch jobs on ICDS-ACI/Roar: Submit a batch job via PBS Read and write data from batch job Run multiple jobs using a job array Lab 7, Exercise 2: Parallelize code for Distributed memory model, using patterns such as: Load code and packages on worker nodes Parallelize code over multiple compute nodes, using at least one of: pmap (recommended) DistributedArrays.

item.title: Exercises
